welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pipra, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and warm hospitality. Get ready to immerse yourself in its unique beauty and experience all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore to your heart's content!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biratnagar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rajbiraj Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rajbiraj Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
